page.title: 10EMMA'S DAY IN HAXEY
page.content: A day in the life of an 11 year-old. I like Saturdays they,for me,are the best day of my week.I always have a good time then.I'm now going to tell you about one Saturday in my life. When I wake up,I usually read for a while.One of my hobbies is reading.I've quite a few hobbies.They are reading,writing,cycling and dancing.At about 8.00am,mum and dad wake up.They just talk about various things and eventually decide to get up.Bruce,my naughty little brother,will nearly always get out a car or two,and play baddies running away from goodies. It is usually about 8.45am before I decide to get out of bed,well unwillingly crawl out of bed."Are we going to town today,mum?"I shout."No, not today",mum'll answer."And don't shout,your not still in the school
